==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|いばら|き|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
According to the story that ancient people in the age of Emperor [[Sujin]]('''崇神''') built a thorny castle([[茨]]の[[城]]) there and wiped out [[burglar|burglars]].

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|いばらき|y=k|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|いばらき|proper}}

# [[Ibaraki]] - a [[prefecture]] in [[関東]](''Kantō'') area, Japan (abbreviation for [[茨城県]])
# ancient place name of [[常陸]] (''Hitachi'')
